description: Your skin has turned the color of the Mediterranean Sea.  Your skin is now a brilliant turquoise color.  This has no gameplay effects.
Your skin has become vaguely gelatinous.  Provides some extra bash defense and immunity to wet effects.
Your skin is completely replaced by magickal water.  You have become immune to acid effects.
Upon gaining this ability the Sylph gains the ability to temporarily breathe without oxygen.  This will prevent damage from a lack of oxygen for a short window.
//: Needs an activated ability that affects the hidden oxygen stat.

description: Upon gaining this ability the Sylph gains the ability to create a loud clap of thunder noise at a distance.
Upon gaining this ability the Undine gains the ability to create a cloud of fog.
//: Needs an activated ability that summons a cloud of fog.

description: Upon gaining this ability the Undine gains the ability to grant one person the ability to float and swim.
//: Needs an activated ability that gives swimming skill or proficiency.

description: Upon gaining this ability the Undine gains the ability to create an acidic mist that damages any creatures inside it.
//: Needs an activated ability that summons an acidic mist.

description: Upon gaining this ability the Undine gains the ability to convert salt water into freshwater and vice versa.
//: Needs to give a recipe to convert saltwater into freshwater. And vice-versa.

description: Upon gaining this ability the Undine gains the ability to grant one person the ability to float and swim.
//: Needs an activated ability that gives swimming skill or proficiency.

description: You've gained the ability to breathe underwater.
Upon gaining this ability the Undine gains the ability to foul water, making it murky and possibly infested.  Conversely, the Undine can also cleanse water that is not already clean.
//: Needs to give a recipe to convert clean water into freshwater. And vice-versa.

description: Upon gaining this ability the Undine gains the ability to convert salt water into freshwater.
//: Needs to give a recipe to convert various liquids into water. Not the other way around.

description: You've gained a resistance to fire.
You've gained a resistance to acid.
The waves themselves answer your call and create a special vehicle for you to travel across the surface of water.
//: Summons a magic kayak vehicle with an engine like the mojocycle.  Make this have a followup spell that summons the vehicle.  Trait should only grant the walker spell.

description: Allows the Undine to create a special pocket that protects things inside of it from water damage.
//: Make spell like the animist spell.

description: Allows the Undine to change the weather to rain.
Allows the Undine to summon fish and eventually charm them.  Practice this enough and you will be able to befriend sea monsters.
//: Make spell like cause bear, use spell enough and it turns into charm fish, then it summons friendly sea monsters.

description: Allows the Undine to create two liters of water for the cost of a tiny bit of damage.
//: Make spell like to create water but use HP like animist.

description: Allows the Undine to summon a minor water elemental, eventually graduating to a water elemental.
//: Make spell like the animist spell.
